sourcesContent:
export const recipe = {
    recipe_id: 1,
    image_url:
      "https://highonflavours.files.wordpress.com/2018/12/1545657502880.jpeg?w=856&h=642",
    ingredients: [
        "Oil – 2 spoons",
        "Butter – 100gms",
        "Onion – 3 medium size",
        "Garlic – Around 40 cloves",
        "Ginger – 1 inch",
        "Green chilies – 10",
        "Coriander leaves",
        "Chicken – 500gm",
        "Turmeric powder – 1 tablespoon",
        "Curry Leaves – 10",
        "Salt"
    ],
    publisher: "Shivani D Moray",
    publisher_url: "https://highonflavours.wordpress.com",
    title: "Coriander Chicken",
    Method: ["1. Heat 2 tablespoons of oil and 50gms of butter in a pan.",
            "2. Add roughly smashed garlic of about 15 cloves and saute until its lightly brown.",
            "3. Now add the sliced onions and fry until onion turns golden brown.",
            "4. Add the marinated chicken and fry until the raw aroma of the grounded masala escapes.",
            "5. Cover the lid and cook for 10-12 minutes. (At this time, if the chicken has not out the water content, add a small glass of water for the chicken to cook.)",
            "6. Now fry the chicken without covering the lid for the excess water to evaporate.",
            "7. Increase the flame, add the left out butter and fry until it gets dry.",
            "8. Serve it hot."]
    
    
  };
